author: Fareed Zakaria
title: This is just the first in a series of cascading crises
description: We need to wrap our minds around a painful truth: This is only the beginning.
content: The first phase has been the health-care crisis in the worlds major economies. The next phase is the economic paralysis, the magnitude of which we are only just beginning to comprehend. In just the past two weeks, the United States lost some 10 million jobs, … [+5007 chars]
